trans-unit.source: Specifies properties and patterns that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework caches when an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> is obtained.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as propriedades e padrões que o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework armazena em cache quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref> é obtido.

trans-unit.source: Retrieving properties and patterns through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] requires cross-process calls that can slow down performance.
trans-unit.target: Recuperando propriedades e padrões por meio de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] exige chamadas entre processos que lento o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: By caching values of proprieties and patterns in a batch operation, you can enhance the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: Armazenando valores de propriedades e padrões em uma operação em lote, você pode melhorar o desempenho do seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Create a new cache request by calling the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: Crie uma nova solicitação de cache chamando o construtor da classe.

trans-unit.source: The request is populated by repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação é preenchida por chamadas repetidas para o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only a single CacheRequest can be active.
trans-unit.target: Somente uma CacheRequest único pode estar ativa.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to activate a request: - Call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> on the request.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar uma solicitação de duas maneiras:-chamar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>na solicitação.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This pushes the request onto the stack, and the request is popped when the object is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isso envia a solicitação para a pilha e a solicitação é exibida quando o objeto é descartado.

trans-unit.source: To ensure disposal even if an exception is raised, use the return value from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> within a `using` block (`Using` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Para garantir o descarte mesmo se uma exceção é gerada, use o valor de retorno <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>dentro de um `using` bloco (`Using` em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Put the request onto the internal stack by calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Colocar a solicitação para a pilha interna chamando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only the topmost request on the stack is active, and it must be the next one removed from the stack by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Somente a solicitação mais alta na pilha está ativa e deve ser um removida da pilha por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Popping the request deactivates it.
trans-unit.target: Exibir a solicitação desativa a ele.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements obtained while the request is active will have cached values for the properties and patterns specified.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]elementos obtidos enquanto a solicitação está ativa serão armazenaram em cache os valores para as propriedades e os padrões especificados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty> identifier is added as a default property to cache.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>é criado, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty>identificador é adicionado como uma propriedade padrão para o cache.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Sets this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> as the active specification for the items that are returned when an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> is requested on the same thread.
trans-unit.target: Define esta <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> como a especificação de ativa para os itens que são retornadas quando uma <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref> for solicitada no mesmo thread.

trans-unit.source: Using this method is usually preferable to using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A> as a means of activating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Usando esse método é geralmente preferível a usar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A>como um meio de ativação de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Pop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Push%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is pushed onto the stack when Activate is called, and then popped off when it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto é inserido na pilha quando ativar é chamado e, em seguida, retirado quando ele é descartado.

trans-unit.source: To ensure disposal, place the return value within a `using` block (`Using` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Para garantir o descarte, coloque o valor de retorno dentro de um `using` bloco (`Using` em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: The object that can be used to dispose the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que pode ser usado para descartar o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern"></xref> identifier to this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern"> </xref> identificador para esse <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adding a pattern that is already in the cache request has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um padrão que já está na solicitação de cache não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: An identifier specifying a pattern to cache.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador que especifica um padrão para o cache.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> is active.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> está ativa.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"></xref> identifier to this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"> </xref> identificador para esse <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty> identifier is added as a default property to cache.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>é criado, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty>identificador é adicionado como uma propriedade padrão para o cache.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.RuntimeIdProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Adding a property that is already in the cache request has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando uma propriedade que já está na solicitação de cache não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: An identifier specifying a property value to cache.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador que especifica um valor de propriedade em cache.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> is active.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> está ativa.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether returned elements should contain full references to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], or only cached information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se os elementos retornados devem conter referências completas para subjacente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], ou apenas informações em cache.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> is the default value, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>é o valor padrão e especifica que os elementos retornados contém uma referência completa a subjacente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], and contain only cached information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>Especifica que os elementos retornados não tem nenhuma referência de subjacente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]e contêm somente informações armazenadas em cache.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>

trans-unit.source: Certain operations on elements, including <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.SetFocus%2A>, require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Algumas operações nos elementos, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.SetFocus%2A>, exigem uma referência completa; tentando executar estas em um elemento que não possui nenhum resulta em um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.SetFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references.
trans-unit.target: Usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>pode ser mais eficiente quando são necessárias apenas as propriedades, pois evita a sobrecarga envolvida na configuração de referências completas.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode"></xref> if the returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; otherwise <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode"></xref>Se os elementos retornados tiverem uma referência completa a subjacente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> that is active on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> que está ativa no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The active <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ativo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the active <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> from the internal stack for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Remove o ativo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> da pilha interna para o thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Only the currently active request can be removed using the Pop method.
trans-unit.target: Somente a solicitação ativa no momento pode ser removida usando o método Pop.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to remove a request that is not the current one results in an exception.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de remover uma solicitação que é não os resultados de um atual em uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> to place the request on the stack.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o aninhamento de solicitações de cache, é preferível usar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>para fazer a solicitação na pilha.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason is that you can use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> within a `using` block (`Using` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: O motivo é que você pode usar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>dentro de um `using` bloco (`Using` em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), garantindo que a solicitação é retirada da pilha mesmo se uma exceção é gerada.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to remove a cache request that was not the last one pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de remover uma solicitação de cache que não era o último deles inserido na pilha.

trans-unit.source: Places the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"></xref> on the internal state stack, making it the active request on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Locais de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest"> </xref> na pilha de estado interno, tornando-a solicitação ativa no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Multiple <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> objects can be placed onto the state stack.
trans-unit.target: Vários <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>objetos podem ser colocados na pilha do estado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Cache requests must be removed from the stack in the order they were pushed on; otherwise, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Solicitações de cache devem ser removidas da pilha na ordem em que elas foram enviadas. Caso contrário, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção será gerada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> to place the request on the stack.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o aninhamento de solicitações de cache, é preferível usar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>para fazer a solicitação na pilha.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason is that you can use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A> within a `using` block (`Using` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: O motivo é que você pode usar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>dentro de um `using` bloco (`Using` em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), garantindo que a solicitação é retirada da pilha mesmo se uma exceção é gerada.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree to use when caching.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o modo de exibição do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore do elemento a ser usado ao armazenar em cache.

trans-unit.source: For additional information on views of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree, see [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações adicionais sobre modos de exibição da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore de elementos, consulte [visão geral de árvore de automação de interface do usuário](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.
trans-unit.target: O modo de exibição do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default view is <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Automation.ControlViewCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A exibição padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Automation.ControlViewCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether caching is done only for the root of the subtree, or also for its children or descendants.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o cache é feito apenas para a raiz da subárvore ou também para seus filhos ou descendentes.

trans-unit.source: The scope of caching is in relation to the object or objects being fetched, not in relation to the object on which <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de armazenamento em cache é em relação a um ou mais objetos que estão sendo buscado, não em relação ao objeto no qual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindFirst%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o exemplo.

trans-unit.source: One or more of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One or more of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property to <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de definir a propriedade <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TreeScope"> </xref>.
